works.description:
These are pictures of me that Mr. Wayne  

Caparas, a commercial photographer, was hired by my company to take  over 

two years ago. I sell a swing manual that was made from these photos and I
 
fear that the free availability of these images will hurt sales. I have  
asked him to remove this gallery because the link is in wide circulation
on  
the Internet.  To date, he has not responded to my requests.
